title: How to Make Strawberry Iced Tea

steps.title: Pour the tea into a ceramic or glass mixing bowl.
steps.content: Pour the tea into a ceramic or glass mixing bowl. Add the 1/3 (or more) cup of sugar and the lemon juice. Stir thoroughly to dissolve the sugar. Test to see if it requires additional sweetening or lemon juice and adjust accordingly.

steps.title: Put several strawberries to one side for garnish.
steps.content: Put several strawberries to one side for garnish. Puree the remaining strawberries. Push the puree through a fine-sieve to remove pips, etc. Press on the mixture with the back of a wooden spoon.

steps.title: Once the tea has cooled, add the puree and mix through thoroughly.
steps.content: Once the tea has cooled, add the puree and mix through thoroughly. Place in the refrigerator for at least a half hour to chill.

steps.title: Serve.
steps.content: Serve. Add crushed ice to the base of an ice tea glass. Pour in a serve of strawberry iced tea per glass. Add several strawberries (whole or sliced) to the side of the glass as a garnish. Add a straw.
